channel.title: Jagex Getting Desparate? About members
channel.description:
Ok i posted a complaint about losing 200k, and they didnt even answer, look...
Dear 0o0o0o0o73, Thank you for your question. At Jagex we always aim to respond to every message we receive from our players individually and as quickly as possible. Unfortunately, due to the massive growth in popularity of RuneScape and the increasing number of queries that brings, we have not been able to keep up, and are not able to offer a personal response this time. We are increasing the size of our customer support unit and hopefully the next time you need help you will be able to get a quick answer! We always give priority to answering all member queries personally, but we are now aiming to answer more free player queries. This number will increase even more in the coming weeks. Why not consider becoming a member and help support the continued development of the game? Plus you'll also get a range of extra features and benefits like four extra bank pages, exclusive quests and you get no adverts that can sometimes put you off your game. As a Member you also get access to the Forums which can usually answer any query you have allowing you more time to play the game. Furthermore, RuneScape.com has a wealth of information available to players in the knowledge base section. You will find the answers to most questions in here, whether it be billing, technical, or game related. Once again many thanks for your query, and apologies that we cannot give a personal response at this time. I hope that this helps resolve your problem. Please always refer to the RuneScape Knowledge Base to find the answer to your queries quicker. You can also find help on all free player and all new member quests through the QuestHelp system. Yours Sincerely Mod Dowd
Ok this is not about losing 200k, i just thought it is funny that they ask everyone to be a member everywhere.

item.title: Jagex Getting Desparate? About members
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

Well there are a few reasons why…

  1. You were an idiot and got scammed…
  2. You died and lost it
  3. your account got “hacked”

all of these are your fault and i seriously doubt that it glitched out and its not like they give a shit what happens to you because you aren’t paying them for the work that there doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Getting Desparate? About members
item.dc:creator: @kulce kulce
item.description:
@kulce wrote:

Ok i posted a complaint about losing 200k, and they didnt even answer, look…

Dear 0o0o0o0o73,

Thank you for your question.

At Jagex we always aim to respond to every message we receive from our players individually and as quickly as possible.

Unfortunately, due to the massive growth in popularity of RuneScape and the increasing number of queries that brings, we have not been able to keep up, and are not able to offer a personal response this time. We are increasing the size of our customer support unit and hopefully the next time you need help you will be able to get a quick answer!

We always give priority to answering all member queries personally, but we are now aiming to answer more free player queries. This number will increase even more in the coming weeks.

Why not consider becoming a member and help support the continued development of the game? Plus you’ll also get a range of extra features and benefits like four extra bank pages, exclusive quests and you get no adverts that can sometimes put you off your game.

As a Member you also get access to the Forums which can usually answer any query you have allowing you more time to play the game.

Furthermore, RuneScape.com has a wealth of information available to players in the knowledge base section. You will find the answers to most questions in here, whether it be billing, technical, or game related.

Once again many thanks for your query, and apologies that we cannot give a personal response at this time.

I hope that this helps resolve your problem.

Please always refer to the RuneScape Knowledge Base to find the answer to your queries quicker.

You can also find help on all free player and all new member quests through the QuestHelp system.

Yours Sincerely
Mod Dowd
